rule: The array should contain the model names extracted from the machine learning paper abstract.
input: Abstract: Machine learning methods have various applications.
validityText:
The input starts with 'Abstract: ', which is compliant with the first part of the specification. It is followed by the abstract text, "Machine learning methods have various applications.", which is a valid text string representing an abstract. There is no requirement in the specification for the inclusion of model names, so the absence of them in this input does not violate the specification. The length of the abstract and the use of the English language meet the criteria outlined in the specification.

No violation.
OK
